ovdesc.p: This file is intended to provide a quick view of any SECURITY.MASTER records having had their respective SUB.ASSET.TYPEs modeified during the course of the current on-line day.

NOTE that when a SUB.ASSET.TYPE is changed on a SECURITY.MASTER file, you are prompted to specify whether or not you wish valuation data (in this case, the SC.POS.ASSET file) updated either on-line or during the end-of-day batch stage.
If you specify "on-line" then the updates occur straightaway. If you specify that you wish the updates to take place during the EOD, then the changes are stored on this file.
This file is always cleared after use by the EOD batch.

desc.p: Shows the new SUB.ASSET.TYPE to which the security has been amended
Shows the previously recorded SUB.ASSET.TYPE for the security
Specifies the id of the security which has undergone a change of SUB.ASSET.TYPE
